name: Ciro Raporu
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS `Satış Siparişi:Link/Sales Order:125`,
    soi.item_code AS `Ürün Kodu:80`,
    i.item_group AS `Malzeme Grubu:110`,
    so.customer AS `Müşteri:110`,
    c.customer_group AS `Müşteri Grubu:110`,
    soi.delivery_date AS `Teslimat Tarihi:110`,
    dn.posting_date AS `İrsaliye Tarihi:110`,
    soi.qty AS `Sipariş Miktarı:110`,
    soi.delivered_qty AS `Teslim Edilen Miktar:110`,
    dni.qty AS `İrsaliye Miktarı:110`,
    so.status AS `Durum:110`,
    CONCAT(
        CASE so.currency
            WHEN 'USD' THEN '$'
            WHEN 'EUR' THEN '€'
            WHEN 'TRY' THEN '₺'
            ELSE so.currency
        END, ' ',
        FORMAT(soi.price_list_rate, 6)
    ) AS `Fiyat:110`,
    so.currency AS `Para Birimi:110`,
    CONCAT(
        CASE so.currency
            WHEN 'USD' THEN '$'
            WHEN 'EUR' THEN '€'
            WHEN 'TRY' THEN '₺'
            ELSE so.currency
        END, ' ',
        FORMAT(IFNULL(dni.qty, 0) * soi.price_list_rate, 6)
    ) AS `İrsaliye Bazlı Tutar:110`,
    CONCAT(
        CASE so.currency
            WHEN 'USD' THEN '$'
            WHEN 'EUR' THEN '€'
            WHEN 'TRY' THEN '₺'
            ELSE so.currency
        END, ' ',
        FORMAT((soi.qty - soi.delivered_qty) * soi.price_list_rate, 6)
    ) AS `Kalan Sipariş Tutarı:110`,
    ip.lead_time_days AS `Lead Time (Gün):110`,
    dn.name AS `Sevk İrsaliyesi:110`
FROM
    `tabSales Order` so
JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` soi ON soi.parent = so.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON i.name = soi.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabCustomer` c ON c.name = so.customer
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem Price` ip ON ip.item_code = soi.item_code
                       AND ip.customer = so.customer
                       AND ip.price_list = so.selling_price_list
                       AND (ip.valid_upto IS NULL OR ip.valid_upto >= CURDATE())
LEFT JOIN
    `tabDelivery Note Item` dni ON dni.so_detail = soi.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabDelivery Note` dn ON dn.name = dni.parent
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1
    AND (
        so.status != 'Closed'
        OR (so.status = 'Closed' AND dn.name IS NOT NULL)
    )
